ModMetaData.name: GiTS Seburo Advanced Weapon Systems
ModMetaData.author: themoistestwhale
ModMetaData.description: Seburo Advanced Weapons Systems is a Japanese megacorporation tasked with creating modern security equipment. Founded in 2024, Seburo provides only the most cutting-edge in small arms weaponry available, found in a multitude of military and police units across the globe. In demanding situations where gear is paramount, Seburo provides an experience unrivalled by any other.\n\nSeburo Advanced Weapon Systems is a Poseidon Global Industrial Technologies company.
